description: Frequently asked questions from our valued customers with detailed answers
q1: How can I create a new account?
a1: You can create a new account by clicking the 'Login' button at the top of the page, then selecting 'Create Account' and filling in the required information.
q2: How can I track my order?
a2: After logging in, you can visit the 'My Orders' page in the dashboard to track the status of all your orders.
a3: We accept cash on delivery, bank transfer, and major credit cards.
a4: Delivery within Madaba takes 1-2 business days, and outside Madaba takes 3-5 business days.
a5: Yes, you can return a product within 14 days of receipt as long as it is in its original condition.
q6: How can I contact a seller?
a6: You can contact a seller directly through the 'Contact Seller' button on the product page.
contactMessage: If you didn't find the answer to your question, feel free to contact us directly.
